entry.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

entry.title: TanqDev88/node-testing-env: A lightweight Node.js environment for testing and debugging JavaScript functions locally. Useful for experimenting with logic, mocking external contexts, and running use case-based tests.
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js environment for testing and debugging JavaScript functions locally. Useful for experimenting with logic, mocking external contexts, and running use case-based tests.

entry.title: Pratik0444/ToDoList: Simple To-Do List App (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) A lightweight, responsive to-do list application built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. This app allows users to add, complete, and delete tasks—all without any backend or storage. Ideal for beginners learning DOM manipulation and event handling.
entry.content: Simple To-Do List App (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) A lightweight, responsive to-do list application built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. This app allows users to add, complete, and delete tasks—all without any backend or storage. Ideal for beginners learning DOM manipulation and event handling.

entry.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
entry.content: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

entry.title: muhammadhamzakhan22/element-essentials: A lightweight, accessible component library providing essential UI building blocks for modern web applications.
entry.content: A lightweight, accessible component library providing essential UI building blocks for modern web applications.

entry.title: olaferlandsen/botbuster: Botbuster is a lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library for detecting abnormal user interactions in the browser. It helps identify bots, scrapers, or users running inside virtualized environments by analyzing mouse behavior, click patterns, and hardware signals.
entry.content: Botbuster is a lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library for detecting abnormal user interactions in the browser. It helps identify bots, scrapers, or users running inside virtualized environments by analyzing mouse behavior, click patterns, and hardware signals.

entry.title: floriandulzky/MemorySnap: MemorySnap - MemorySnap is a lightweight web app for weddings and events that lets guests participate in fun photo challenges. Capture memories, complete creative tasks, and relive the best moments — all in one shared place.

entry.title: Johan4954/SubProbe: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
